text: 100 Tears is a 2007 slasher comedy movie. The story is about revenge. This movie was released with an NC-17 rating. ==Awards== Award Subject Nominee Result Tabloid Witch Awards Best Actress Georgia Chris Tabloid Witch Awards Best Supporting Actress Raine Brown Tabloid Witch Awards Best Make-Up Effects Marcus Koch == References == Category:Comedy horror movies Category:2007 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:American independent movies
title: 100 Tears
